name: 美少女ストリーマーの秘密恋愛 - Secret romance with streamer girls
name_original: 美少女ストリーマーの秘密恋愛 - Secret romance with streamer girls
description:
◆Introduction◆

Everything is going so well that I'm afraid of everything. She's cute and easy to talk to, but she's actually a famous streamer...
It's something I've always wanted, something I wouldn't even dream of.
Or should I say, this is something that can only bring about trouble. But I've been blinded by my feelings...

Secret romance with streamer girls" is a novel game in which a secret love story develops between the protagnist and the heroines through their interactions.

◆Synopsis◆

The main character "Nishi Eita", with his sharp intuition and passion for streamers,
discovers that his classmate "Yume Harukawa" is a famous singer-streamer.
While trying to use the secret to get closer, Eita also meets other streamers through Yume.

Ritsu Shinonome is a friend of Yume and a V-streamer.
Yuuka Asaki is the wife of a neighbor and live-streamer of retro games.

As he became involved with the three girls, Eita began to feel that he wanted to support them more than anyone else.

But if anyone finds out about his relationship with the female streamers, everything will fall apart!
In addition, the girls have problems and troubles unique to streamers...

How will the "Secret romance" that can't be discovered turn out...!?

◆Characters◆

・Yume Harukawa

"I see~ I didn't know there was a singer like that."

The protagonist's classmate. She's kind of an airhead with a dreamy personality.
She's actually an amazing singer and has the skills to make her dream of becoming a singer come true.
Although she likes the attention, she doesn't want to be seen in a bad light,
so she keeps her streaming activites a secret from her classmates.



・Ritsu Shinonome

"Isn't this new outfit cute! Feel free to like me even now from now on!"

A bright, high-spirited female student who attends a different school than the protagonist.
She is a charismatic V-streamer with over 200,000 channel subscribers.
She takes the unusual stance of not caring about revealing her identity or love status.
Perhaps concerned about her somewhat short stature, the avatar she uses in her stream is tall.



・Yuuka Asaki

"So you also like games~ But I'm not familiar with recent games."

A bewitchingly beautiful wife who lives in the protagonist's neighborhood. Contrary to her calm demeanor, she is quite sharp.
She is a retro game streamer who is famous enough to earn an income,
but seems to keep it a secret from everyone around her.
She has no children and her relationship with her husband seems to be rather cold...?



・Eita Nishi
A maniac who lives to follow the streamers of an online website.
He has an instinct that only sharpens with respect to the streamers,
and succeeds in connecting with the heroines.
